style_guide.visual_style: High-quality Korean webtoon style with clean digital illustration, soft natural colors, expressive faces, modern fashion, atmospheric lighting
style_guide.segment_story: A young woman visits a cozy cafe and interacts with a male barista. She orders coffee, asks about menu options and amenities, enjoys her drink, and expresses gratitude. The scene progresses from ordering at the counter to receiving and tasting her beverage.

images.prompt_used: A cozy modern Korean cafe interior scene, young woman in beige oversized knit cardigan over white t-shirt with gold necklace and long wavy brown hair standing at wooden counter, facing handsome male barista in cream knit sweater with brown canvas apron and soft brown hair behind the counter, warm friendly interaction between them, cafe background with wooden shelves displaying coffee equipment and plants, warm pendant lighting overhead, espresso machine visible on counter, natural morning sunlight through large windows, soft atmospheric cafe ambiance, high-quality Korean webtoon manhwa art style, clean digital illustration, detailed character faces with expressive warm smiles, professional webtoon rendering with smooth cel shading and clean lines, modern casual aesthetic, soft natural color palette with earth tones and warm lighting, both characters prominently featured in unified cafe space, 3/4 view angles, welcoming coffee shop atmosphere, 1080x1080 pixels square format
